Computers 4 Kidz
materials: Computer (Reuse); Computer Monitors; Computer (Recycling); Hard Drives; Furniture; Inkjet Printer Cartridges; Plastics (Other); Packing Peanut (Reuse); Laser Toner Cartridges; Printers/Scanners/Fax Machines; Video Game Consoles; PlayStation Consoles
notes:
Donations can be shipped to this address.  All donations, including shipping charges are tax deductible.  To arrange a free pick-up, please call the office.  

This site accepts the following: CPU's (Pentium and above), working or not WORKING monitors, keyboards, mouse, mouse pads, printers and printer supplies, speakers, microphone, Software (office, home, OS, and children's), all computer peripherals (modems, audio or video cards, processors, CD drives, cords, cables, etc), Networking equipment (Ethernet cable, USB cable, networking cards, Routing equipment, etc), computer desks and chairs, office furnishings (desks, filing cabinets, chairs, conference tables, printer stands, partitions, lamps, shelving, etc), office supplies (printer paper, ink cartridges (full or empty), pens/pencils, file folders, hanging files, mouse pads, markers, bulletin boards, desk organizers, etc), Packing Supplies (boxes, bubble wrap, tape, tape dispensers, styrofoam packaging, peanuts, etc).
